123484.「本当に <%sL_ITEM>を\n いただいてしまって よろしいのですか！？\:

<%sL_ITEM>?!
<yesno><break>

123751.「あの……。ぬいぐるみを\n ひとつも 持っておられないようです。: I see that you don't have a single plushie.

123813.「あら……。でも <pc>さんは\n 持ち物が いっぱいのようですね。\n<br:

again?

123985.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「……まあ！:
Well...well! I can't believe I got such a big plushie with such a big presence! Is this a plushie modeled after the Great Sabrecat
monster, rather than a cat? From the name, it must be a very scary monster, even though the plushie is so cute!

123986.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは ゴ:
This is a monster called Golem. I think it is a big monster like a rock giant. Even such a tough-looking monster can become so cute when
it becomes a plushie!

123987.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「……まあ！:
Well...well! I can't believe I got such a big and presentable plushie! This is a monster called Golem. I think it is a big monster like
a rock giant. Even such a tough-looking monster can become such a cute plushie!

123988.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは……:
This is... a face in a box with a nasty look in its eyes... is it a monster called "Mimic"? I see... so it pretends to be a treasure
chest, and is attacking adventurers... but there is no such danger with a plushie... is there?

123989.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「……まあ！:

123990.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「……まあ！:

this just one plushie? It looks like a very reasonable plushie! I feel a little sorry for the bottom one, though...

123991.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「……まあ！:

123992.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは 巻:

123993.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「まあ……。:
Well... it's a very energetic and yankee looking plushie. I wonder if the model is the same. When I was a child, my mother used to
read me an old picture book about a hero who slays demons, and I somehow resemble that hero... Also, this faded look is good for a
calm atmosphere. It makes me feel a little sentimental...

123994.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「まあ！ ず:
Oh, my! What a cute little girl plushie! The goggles on her head are a unique point of interest, and I think it's a bit of a bargain!

123995.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「……まあ！:
...well! This plushie is modeled after a well- known sage belonging to the Crown of Wisdom organization? I see...even as a plushie, it
still exudes an undeniable power. I guess I should say that it is indeed....

123996.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは ウ:
This is an animal called a rabbit. I don't think it exists in our world, but I have seen it in picture stories when I was a child! Is
that the groom's dress for his wedding? If there is a bride, I would like to display them next to each other!

124150.すでに プレゼントしている\nぬいぐるみなので 渡せません！:
I can't give it to you because it's a plushie
I already gave you!

124451.「同じ場所に飾っていた\n <%sL_RETURN_ITEM>は お返ししますね:

displayed in the same place.

124452.すべての 飾り台の上が\nぬいぐるみで いっぱいになった！<me 72>:

filled with plushies!<me 72>

124453.飾り台の上が ぬいぐるみで いっぱいになった！<me 71>: The top of the table was filled with plushies!<me 71>

124455.「とても よい感じに 飾れました。\n <pc>さん ありがとうございました！:
You did a wonderful job with the decoration.

125182.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは ク:
This is an animal called a bear. I don't think it exists in our world, but I have seen it in picture stories when I was a child! Is that a
wedding groom's outfit? If there is a bride, I would like to display them next to each other!

125183.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは ク:
This is an animal called a bear. I don't think it exists in our world, but I have seen it in picture stories when I was a child! Is that a
bride's wedding dress? If there is a groom, I would like to display them next to each other!

125184.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「なんだか:
It's kind of cute, but is it a plushie modeled after a boy named Tazzi? Is this a plushie modeled after a boy named Tazzi? The way he
looks so troubled and timid makes me want to protect him. He looks like an abandoned puppy.

125185.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは サ:
Is this a plushie modeled after Sarias? She seems to be very beautiful. Her eyelashes are very clear and impressive. I would like to
meet her in person!

125186.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは……:
This... is a plushie of an animal called a rabbit, judging by the long ears, isn't it? But there's something special about it... did
your concierge give it to you? The two of you must be very close to receive such a wonderful gift. I am truly sorry to have received
something so precious. I will treasure it even more than before!

125187.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは……:
This... is a plushie of an animal called a rabbit, judging from the long ears, isn't it? But there is something special about it... I
think it is a representation of a white, fuzzy animal that is happy to be dressed in a rabbit costume! ...Maybe it's not. But if it's this
cute, it doesn't matter what it is, does it?

125188.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは……:
This... is a plushie of an animal called a rabbit, judging by the long ears. But there's something special about it... did you get it
from your private concierge? Does have a private concierge? And to be presented with such a cute plushie,
really is something out of the ordinary, isn't she?

125189.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「あっ これ:
Oh, I know what this is. It's a plushie of a boy of the dragon tribe, isn't it? I'm a little impressed that they even made a plushie
for us dragon people! If you look closely, doesn't this one look a bit like Tobias? Could he be the model?

125333.「あっ……。おやめに なるのですね。\n ちょっと 残念です…………。:
Oh... you're going to quit, aren't you? I'm a
little disappointed...

125334.「あら……。\n 別のぬいぐるみを いただけるのですか？: Oh... can I have another plushie?

125335.「……ごめんなさい。\n <pc>さんが持っている ぬいぐるみは\n すでに い:
...sorry about that. It seems that all the
plushie that <pc> has are already
given to me.

125336.「あら……。飾り台の上も\n あなたの持ち物も いっぱいのようで\n ぬいぐるみ:
Oh no... it looks like we can't exchange the plushie because the display table and your belongings are full. I'm sorry, but could you
please make room in your item bag and come back again?

125642.「あっ…… 一度いただいた ぬいぐるみは\n 別のぬいぐるみとの 交換でない限り:
Oh... please note that once you receive a
plushie, you will not be able to return it
unless you exchange it for another plushie.

127548.ぬいぐるみ 人形といった名称でも\n例外的に エステラに渡せないものもあります。:
Some dolls, such as plushie dolls, cannot be
given to Estella in exceptional cases. Please
understand.

134390.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「まあ……。:
I can't believe you brought such a big plushie for me! Oh, I know what this is. It's a plushie of a boy of the dragon tribe, isn't
it? I'm a little impressed that they even made a plushie for us dragon people!

134391.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「あっ これ:
Oh, I know what this is. It is a plushie of a dragon tribe girl, isn't it? I didn't think they even made plushies for us dragon people.
I am very happy! Who was the model? I know it wasn't me, but I'm a little curious...

134392.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「まあ……。:
I can't believe you brought such a big plushie for me! Oh, I know what this is. It's a plushie of a dragon tribe girl! I didn't think
they even made plushies for us dragon people. I am so happy!

134393.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「まあ かわ:
Well, that's cute! Is this a plushie of a girl named Aili? I have a hunch that what she is holding with both hands is freshly baked
bread. It looks very delicious!

134394.「これは……。\n とても 美しい方のように見えるのですが\n ちょっと 危険な:
This... she looks very beautiful, but there's a hint of danger. Is she what you call a witch? I see. This beauty is demonic...
demonic woman... is this the kind of woman that attracts the hearts of gentlemen?

134395.「これは……。とても かわいらしいですが\n ずいぶんと 暖かそうな服を着ていま:
This is... a very cute and warm outfit... I saw that there is a place called Ice Realm here, and I saw that Astoltia also has a place
where you need this kind of outfit. I'm not a big fan of the cold, but it might not be a bad idea to get all warm and cozy in this kind of
clothing.

134396.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは……:
This is a plushie wearing an unfamiliar outfit, but I see that it is the formal attire for celebrating the New Year in Astoltia! It's
very glamorous and wonderful. If I ever go to Astoltia, I would love to wear one!

134397.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「こ……これ:
What is this? Could it possibly be a plushie modeled after me? I am so happy that you made it so adorable, but...to be honest, I am
embarrassed and at a loss for reaction. It's so mean of you to give this to a plushie for decoration...

134398.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「こ……これ:
What is this? Could it possibly be a plushie modeled after me? I am very happy that you made it so lovely, but... to be honest, I am
embarrassed and at a loss for a response. It looks faded and old, so I wonder if I can convince myself that it's not modeled after
me...

134399.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「……まあ:
...well, what a muddle! This looks like a demon plushie. Netherlord Nergel.... But even the most evil and ferocious demons are so cute
when they become like this, plushie is truly a great thing.

134400.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは……:
What is this...? For some reason, I have a feeling that this plushie wants a friend. Would you like to be my friend? No, I don't
think so. She may be a little difficult, but I'm sure we'll get along!

134401.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「まあ！ か:
Oh, my! She is a cute and strong looking girl plushie, Lynn, you say? The hairs growing out of her head are indescribably adorable and
make me want to pull on them.

134402.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「……あら？:
Oh? A very demure female plushie, Celia, you say? Personally, I would love to make her a pair of shoes. I wonder if I can make them
myself...

139173.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「まあ なん:
Oh, how adorable! I am honored to receive this. I'm almost mistakenly thinking that I'm somehow special to be able to receive such a
wonderful plushie.

139174.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは 竜:
This is a plushie of a dragon girl. I wonder if this is what they mean when they say she is sparkling and pretty as an angel. I have to
take my hat off to Astoltia for her cuteness in making a plushie of a dragon tribe.

139175.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは 竜:
This is a plushie of a dragon boy. The pose of the boy with his hand on his glasses is cute and hateful. I have to tip my hat to Astoltia
for making a plushie of a dragon boy.

141290.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは……:
This... looks like a very beautiful person, but I feel a little bit dangerous. But the flowers around her are very beautiful. There
are so many kinds of flowers in Astoltia that I don't know about. I would like to see them in person someday.

141291.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは 人:

141292.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「……まあ！:

141293.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは 巻:

141294.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「……まあ！:

plushie is perfectly cute, but why is the jewel dancing...? I can't sleep at night if I start thinking about it.

141295.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「なんだか:

can't sleep at night if I start thinking about it.

150078.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「……まあ！:
...Wow! You're really going to give me such a big and amazing plushie?!

The hard helmet part is also soft and plushy, and all I want to do is just hug it tightly.

150079.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「あら かわ:

The hard helmet part is also soft and plushy, and all I want to do is just hug it tightly.

150080.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「……まあ！:

150081.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「ええ もち:

150082.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「……まあ！:

150083.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは……:

150084.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは……:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>

at my heartstrings!

150085.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは……:
Isn't this... the Elisabette plushie I gave you a warning about before? I never thought that I would be able to display something I
designed in my room like this... I am now deeply moved!

150086.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは……:
This...is some kind of delicious looking plushie. Is it called Whipped Scream? I'm ashamed to call a monster delicious
looking...it's like I'm being greedy.

150087.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「あら！ と:
Oh, my! You get a very cute sized plushie, don't you? This...is some kind of delicious looking plushie. Is it called Whipped Scream?

150089.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「あら！ と:
Oh, my! You are getting a very cute sized plushie, aren't you? This is... a tree plushie, so different in appearance from the
trees that grow in the Fire Realm... I would have never guessed that the Astoltia trees have faces on them.

150090.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは……:
This is... a plushie of a strange and incomprehensible monster. Wakame Oji...is he a prince? They say that appearances are
deceiving, but it is the same in the world of monsters, isn't it?

150091.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「あら！ と:
Oh, my! You are getting a very cute sized plushie, aren't you? This is...a plushie of a strange and incomprehensible monster. Wakame
Oji...is he a prince? They say that appearances are deceiving...but I guess it's the same in the monster world.

150092.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは……:
This is... a plushie of a lady with a classy look. She is wearing unfamiliar attire. What on earth is this...? Well! Is this a school

150093.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは……:
This is... an intelligent-looking male plushie. He is wearing unfamiliar attire. What on earth is this...? Well! Is this a school
uniform? I am impressed by the high level of culture in Astoltia.

150094.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは……:
This is... a very cheeky-looking boy plushie. I feel a rebellious spirit that seems to be swearing at any moment, but it's strange
because it also seems cute when it's a plushie.

150095.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは……:
This is... a very pretty girl plushie. There is a certain air of something out of the ordinary about her, which is strange, because

150096.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは……:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>
This is a plushie of a very strong-looking
woman. She looks like a queen with a lot of
retainers.

150097.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは……:
This is a plushie of a woman who looks very kind and mild-mannered. The slightly lined eyes ooze a friendly and good-natured
atmosphere from the plushie.

159681.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは……:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>
This is a plushie of a very dependable man. I
guess he is a popular person who is relied on
by many people.

159683.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは……:
This is a plushie wearing an unfamiliar outfit, but I see that it is the formal attire for the New Year celebration in Astoltia! It's
very stylish and eye-catching. The culture of Astoltia is very deep to celebrate the New Year in such beautiful clothes.

159684.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは……:
This is...a very large and strong looking dragon plushie. It's a wonder that even such a dragon can be considered cute once it becomes
like this...plushie is really deep...

159685.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは……:
This is a plushie that is not only large in size, but also venomous and strangely cute. Is this what you call "toxic cuteness"? The
definition of "cute" is a bit of a puzzle to me...

159686.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは……:
I am surprised at the size of this plushie, but it is a very strange creature with a triangular head and lots of legs. Ah... So
this is the "creepy-cute" thing I've been hearing about for a long time! I finally understood.

159687.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「まあ なん:
Well, how cute! The cool gaze that makes it hard to tell what she is thinking is very cute! Kyururu-san, you say? I would love to
meet her if she is the model.

159688.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは……:
This is a plushie of a nice lady with a red ribbon. Is her name Mereade? She looks demure at first glance, but I feel she is actually an
energetic woman full of curiosity. Am I right?

159689.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは……:
This is a plushie, a very strange creature I've never seen before. And yet... strangely familiar. Well... This is in the shape of
Nadraga's family? I wish I could have met a real prifie, and heard Nadraga's story before he fell into demon miasma...

159690.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「……まあ！:
Well...well! This plushie is modeled after a hero princess who was destined to fight against the Demon King... as a woman, I can't
help but wonder how much of a burden that must have been for her. But this plushie exudes girlish cuteness. I think her forehead is
especially cute! By the way, did this faded look come from washing? By the way, did this faded look fade in the wash?

159691.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「……まあ！:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>
...well! This plushie is modeled after a
thief? So, this is a criminal plushie in spite
of being so cute. So cute and yet...

159692.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「こ……これ:
What is this? Could it possibly be a plushie modeled after me? And why are the antlers in the ears of a rabbit? I think it's cute,
but... to be honest, I'm more embarrassed. It's so mean of to give this to a plushie for decoration...

199266.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは……:

the contrary, cute and makes me smile when I see it. Also, this faded feeling is good for a calm atmosphere. It seems to make me feel a
little sentimental...

205686.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>\n「これは……:
This is... a plushie of a HUMAN woman with a mysterious vibe. But she is very cute. If there is a model, she must be a lovely person,
too.

205687.「……………………。\n<br>\n「……あっ！ すみません。\n 感動のあまり:
... ...Oh! I'm sorry. I'm speechless with
emotion. What a humorous and adorable plushie!
Thank you for the wonderful gift.

205688.「これは……かわいらしくも\n どことなく 恐ろしげな雰囲気を ただよわせた\n:
This is... a plushie with a cute yet somehow terrifying atmosphere. I feel as if I am being stared at, which makes me somewhat restless.
But that's what makes it unique.

205689.「これは……子ブタちゃんを模した\n ぬいぐるみでしょうか？\n<br>\n「…:
Is this...a plushie in the shape of a little piggy? Is this a terrible demon that casts death spells? The way of the plushie is a very
difficult one, isn't it?

257317.「これは……見たこともない\n 奇妙な生き物の ぬいぐるみですね。\n<br>\:
This is...a plushie of the strangest creature I have ever seen. Is it a demon called Belial? Judging by its appearance, it must be a
cunning little demon.

261148.「これは……とっても オシャレで\n かわいらしい女の子の ぬいぐるみですね。\:
This is... a very fashionable and pretty girl plushie. ...Well, is she the daughter of a nobleman of the Demon World? When you put it
that way, it certainly does have a certain charm of the small demon type.

261149.「これは……とっても オシャレで\n かわいらしい女の子の ぬいぐるみですね。\:
This is... a very fashionable and pretty girl plushie. ...Well, is she the daughter of a nobleman of the Demon World? Now that you put
it that way, I can certainly see the charm of a little demon. The calm coloring is like an antique, and even gives off a sense of luxury,
perhaps because the model is a young lady?

265276.「これは……清楚で おしとやかな雰囲気の\n 女性の ぬいぐるみですね。\n<b:
This is a plushie of a lady with a neat and gentle atmosphere. ...Is the model a very gentle person? ...I guess people are not
always what they appear to be.

271992.「これは……ただならぬ 大物の雰囲気を\n ただよわせる ぬいぐるみですね。\n:
This is... a plushie with a big-time vibe. What a plushie....the Demon King who rules the western part of the Demon World? He is the
Demon King who rules the western part of the Demon World?

276127.「これは……かわいいけれど\n どことなく 危険な雰囲気を\n ただよわせる ぬ:
This is... a plushie that is cute but somehow has a dangerous atmosphere. If it weren't for the skull... why did they make it so
realistic?

282856.「これは……ツノの形こそ 気になりますが\n やさしげで 高貴な雰囲気を感じます:
The shape of the horn is a little worrisome, but it seems gentle and noble. Zubari! Isn't he a prince's plushie? Is he a Demon King who
rules the eastern part of Demon World? I feel that he is a plushie, but he also has a powerful magic power.

297519.「これは……１０と書かれた王冠を被った\n スライムの ぬいぐるみなんですね。\:
So this is... a Slime plushie wearing a crown with the number 10 on it. Very cute... well..! So this is a celebratory Slime for the 10th
anniversary. It sure makes me happy just to look at it.

302627.「これは……とっても かわいい\n おサルさんの ぬいぐるみですね。\n<br>:
This is... a very cute monkey plushie. I'm so excited to have such a lovely monkey in my room. I'm sorry... I'm sorry, I didn't hear
that.

302628.「これは……とっても かわいい\n ニワトリさんの ぬいぐるみですね。\n<br:
This is... a very cute chicken plushie. I
think it's a very good deal because it has a
chick and is twice as cute!

302629.「これは……とっても かわいい\n ワンちゃんの ぬいぐるみですね。\n<br>:
This is... a very cute little doggie plushie. What's that load she's carrying on her back? She looks kind of unhappy, and I wonder if
she's running away from home...

302630.「これは……とっても かわいい\n ウリボーさんの ぬいぐるみですね。\n<br:
This is...a very cute plushie of Uribo. Uribo is a child of a wild boar, so called because the stripes on its body resemble those of a
melon.

302631.「これは……とっても かわいい\n ネズミさんの ぬいぐるみですね。\n<br>:
This is...a very cute plushie by mouse. The ribbon on the tail is so fashionable and adorable, I think I'm going to become a
plushie. I'm sorry. I'm sorry, I didn't hear that.

302632.「これは……とっても かわいい\n ウシさんの ぬいぐるみですね。\n<br>\:
This is... a very cute bovine plushie. The indescribable pastoral expression is irresistible. I'm sorry. I'm sorry, I didn't
hear that.

302633.「これは……とっても かわいい\n トラさんの ぬいぐるみですね。\n<br>\:
This is... a very cute tiger plushie. Huh? But I thought I heard that tigers are yellow with black stripes...I see. There is also a white
tiger, isn't there?

312226.「これは……ええと？ とってもおおきな\n 肉まんの……ぬいぐるみでしょうか？\:
Is this a... uh? Is this a very large plushie? What? Is this an animal called a sludge seal? It's true, it's white and just as cute as a
snow fairy!

318065.「これは！ うさぎさんのぬいぐるみ……？\n つぶらな瞳が とっても かわいいで:
This is! A rabbit plushie...? The dull eyes are very cute! What? This plushie can be resized? I didn't know it had such a wonderful
function... I'll try changing the size and play with it later!

318066.「まあ！ これは……とっても かわいいですが\n 一体……なんの ぬいぐるみなの:
Oh, my! This is... very cute, but... what kind of plushie is it? The ears look like rabbits... but the nose looks like a pig...?
The soles of her feet are hearts, aren't they? I see. Is this Hardie from the cafe that's been getting a lot of buzz right now? No
wonder she is so fashionable!

324454.「これは クマさん版 聖天の使いのぬいぐるみ？\n 私が見た聖天の使いの方は ヒ:
The Holy Messenger I saw was a human, but I didn't know that bears also existed! I think it would be a wonderful memory present if such
a Holy Messenger came to visit me!

327103.「これは……メンダコさんというのですね。\n タコといえば タコメットは知ってい:
This is...Flapjack Octopus, isn't it? I know Octopot, but it looks very different from Octopus... I see! There are many kinds of
octopus. This Flapjack Octopus looks like a flower in bloom and is very cute!
